text: Tara balale -- ''amara atyacarita hayechi amadera kache tomara agamanera age ebam amadera kache tomara asara pare'o.’’ Tini balalena -- ''hate pare tomadera prabhu tomadera satrudera dhbansa karabena, ara acire'i tomadera tini pratinidhi tha'orabena desera madhye, yena tini dekhate parena kemanabhabe tomara kaja karo.’’
